name: Hupia (Train Jam 2018)
description:
You are Locuo, well you were. Now dead and seeking to pass a trail to return to the physical realm, you must move between the spirit world and the real one to escape your fate. 

Developed by 

Andy Runyon -Animation 
Jarory de Jesus - Design/Programming
Jazmin Giolito -  Audio
Mary Flaherty - 2D/3D ARt
Mauro Delgaudio - Tech Art
Theodore McCormick - Level Design
